mapper.insert: insert into em_user_template(userId, templateId, templateInfo) values (#{userId}, #{templateId}, #{templateInfo})
mapper.select: select templateInfo from em_user_template where templateId = #{templateId}

select t3.templateId, t3.viewCount, COUNT(t4.id) as registerCount from (select t1.userId, t1.templateId, t2.comeSite, COUNT(t1.templateId) as viewCount from em_user_template t1 LEFT JOIN em_template_detail t2 on t1.templateId = t2.templateId where t1.userId = #{userId} GROUP BY t1.templateId) t3 LEFT JOIN em_template_detail t4 on t3.templateId = t4.templateId GROUP BY t3.templateId
